content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Steam engine at (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler at (-4.5, 16.0)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected by pipe groups carrying water and steam
- Connected to electricity network powering various machines

### Iron Mining and Smelting Setup 1
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0)
- Wooden chest at (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace at (-25.0, -59.0)
- Burner inserter at (-23.5, -58.5)
- Storage chest at (-22.5, -58.5)

### Iron Mining and Smelting Setup 2
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-18.0, -53.0)
- Wooden chest at (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter at (-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace at (-15.0, -51.0)
- Burner inserter at (-13.5, -50.5)
- Storage chest at (-12.5, -50.5)

### Coal Mining System
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (41.0, -82.0)
- Wooden chest at (41.5, -80.5)
- Burner inserter at (41.5, -79.5)

### Automation Science Pack Production
Consists of:
- Input chest at (5.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter at (6.5, 13.5)
- Assembling machine at (8.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter at (10.5, 13.5)
- Output chest at (11.5, 13.5)
- Connected belt groups for material transport
- Additional chest at (6.5, 14.5)
- Stone furnace at (14.0, 14.0)

### Research Lab
- Lab with automation science pack input
- Currently researching logistics technology

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to extract non-existent items
- Check if items exist in the chest before attempting to extract them
- Verify the correct chest is being accessed for item extraction
- Implement proper error handling when items are not available

### Power system issues
- Monitor coal levels in boiler and add fuel before it runs out
- Keep coal mining system operational to maintain steady fuel supply

### Production stoppages
- Ensure continuous supply of raw materials (copper plates, iron gear wheels)
- Monitor and maintain fuel levels in all burner devices
- Keep input/output chests stocked with required materials

### Assembling machine ingredient shortages
- Verify all required ingredients are available before starting production
- Maintain proper supply chains for all required materials
- Monitor input chest inventory levels regularly
